page.title: 15Forestry and Horticulture.
page.content: Between 85-l50m the Forestry Commision manages mixed woodland much of which was replanted l6 years ago on opencast reclaimed land. Hill Head Farm at l86m, specialises mainly in hay crops with some barley and meadow turf is stripped off for direct sale to the public for garden lawns. The hay is used to feed 37 store cattle which are sold in Tyneside auction mart, Carlisle and Hexham, for slaughter. Marshall Land's farm occupies land between Whickham and Sunniside. It specialises in arable crops with some specialist fruit growing. In l985 a Council nursery was established to provide plants, for parks, gardens and public areas within GMB and particularly for the National Garden Festival to be held in Gateshead in l989.
